Add detailed workflows for content review, editing, and promotion.

recommendations.issue: No mention of content management systems or plugins.
recommendations.suggestion: Specify plugins or CMS features used for SEO, analytics, and content editing.
Expand example responses for common questions.

feedback.overall_feedback: The DevInsights blog specification is well-structured with comprehensive technical setup and tool integration. To improve, it should include clear writing guidelines, SEO strategies, and accessibility standards. Expanding on workflows and example responses will enhance implementation readiness.

original:
# Tech Blog - DevInsights

A personal tech blog focusing on web development, software engineering practices, and emerging technologies.

## About This Blog

DevInsights is where I share my thoughts on modern web development, document my learning journey, and explore new technologies. The blog covers both technical tutorials and industry insights.

## Content Categories

### Web Development
- Frontend frameworks (React, Vue, Svelte)
- Backend development with Node.js and Python
- Full-stack project walkthroughs
- Performance optimization techniques

### Software Engineering
- Clean code principles and practices
- Testing strategies and tools
- Architecture patterns and design
- Code review best practices

### Emerging Tech
- AI/ML applications in web development
- WebAssembly and its use cases
- Progressive Web Apps (PWAs)
- Serverless computing trends

## Popular Posts

- "Building a Real-time Chat App with WebSockets"
- "Micro-frontends: When and How to Use Them"
- "A Deep Dive into React Server Components"
- "Database Design Patterns for Scalable Applications"

## Technical Setup

### Static Site Generator
- Built with Gatsby.js and React
- Markdown-based content management
- GraphQL for data queries
- Automatic image optimization

### Hosting & Deployment
- Deployed on Netlify
- Continuous deployment from GitHub
- Custom domain with SSL
- CDN for global performance

### Analytics & SEO
- Google Analytics integration
- SEO-optimized with meta tags
- Sitemap generation
- RSS feed for subscribers

## Writing Schedule

New posts published every Tuesday and Friday. Newsletter sent monthly with curated content and industry updates.

## Contact

Follow me on Twitter @devinsights or email hello@devinsights.dev

## License

All content licensed under Creative Commons BY-SA 4.0

## Status

Active blog with 200+ posts. Consistently updated since 2021.
